messages.message: Hi what is the recommended API to call (as a site admin) if I wanted to get a list of all community users / accounts. I.e. I want the new community users, not ones that have been added to a commerical org?

er i don’t think we have a specialized endpoint for just fetching community users

i think you’d just use the normal endpoint for fetching all users in the environment? cc @Xindi Xu
We don’t have that. We can do that with DB query. Query all the users and remove ones exists in the user_active_organizations table.

@Xindi Xu is there an endpoint that returns to you whether you have an active organization? If so we could use the get all user’s API and then for each user query their active organization. (I think for Lee’s case, I’m guessing he’s building grafana dashboards for usage that ideally we could do with just API calls and not require direct DB access)
Got it. /api/v1/<username>/info will return active org info for a single user
Ok thanks, i’ll follow that approach.
